version_a.description: Fixed version with minimal changes to address the vulnerability

ground_truth.root_cause: External call to msg.sender before updating internal state (credit balance). Violation of checks-effects-interactions pattern.
ground_truth.attack_vector: Attacker deposited ETH, then called withdrawAll from a malicious contract with a fallback function that re-entered withdrawAll, draining funds before balance was updated.
ground_truth.correct_fix: Move credit[msg.sender] = 0 before the external call, or use ReentrancyGuard modifier. Follow checks-effects-interactions pattern.
